analysis.description:
Reentrancy in Revolution2.doInvest (/unique_chucks/24/0x8d87c5b8cd2b0ddcf1814d2a6e24659775b5215f.sol#564-639):
	External calls:
	- senderIsInvestor = m_investors.isInvestor(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/24/0x8d87c5b8cd2b0ddcf1814d2a6e24659775b5215f.sol#599-600)
	- referrerAddr.notZero() && ! senderIsInvestor && ! m_referrals[msg.sender] && referrerAddr != msg.sender && m_investors.isInvestor(referrerAddr) (/unique_chucks/24/0x8d87c5b8cd2b0ddcf1814d2a6e24659775b5215f.sol#600-622)
	External calls sending eth:
	- msg.sender.transfer(excess) (/unique_chucks/24/0x8d87c5b8cd2b0ddcf1814d2a6e24659775b5215f.sol#590-592)
	- advertisingAddress.send(m_advertisingPercent.mul(receivedEther)) (/unique_chucks/24/0x8d87c5b8cd2b0ddcf1814d2a6e24659775b5215f.sol#594-596)
	- adminsAddress.send(m_adminsPercent.mul(receivedEther)) (/unique_chucks/24/0x8d87c5b8cd2b0ddcf1814d2a6e24659775b5215f.sol#596-599)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- m_referrals (/unique_chucks/24/0x8d87c5b8cd2b0ddcf1814d2a6e24659775b5215f.sol#602-605)

elements.expression: referrerAddr.notZero() && ! senderIsInvestor && ! m_referrals[msg.sender] && referrerAddr != msg.sender && m_investors.isInvestor(referrerAddr)

Address.isNotContract (/unique_chucks/24/0x8d87c5b8cd2b0ddcf1814d2a6e24659775b5215f.sol#117-129) is declared view but contains assembly code

	External calls:

	State variables written after the call(s):

i in PrivateEntrance.provideAccessFor (/unique_chucks/24/0x8d87c5b8cd2b0ddcf1814d2a6e24659775b5215f.sol#262) is a local variable never initialiazed

Revolution2.disqualifyAddress (/unique_chucks/24/0x8d87c5b8cd2b0ddcf1814d2a6e24659775b5215f.sol#461-466) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-m_investors.disqalify(addr) (/unique_chucks/24/0x8d87c5b8cd2b0ddcf1814d2a6e24659775b5215f.sol#463-465)

	External calls:

	- referrerAddr.notZero() && ! senderIsInvestor && ! m_referrals[msg.sender] && referrerAddr != msg.sender && m_investors.isInvestor(referrerAddr) (/unique_chucks/24/0x8d87c5b8cd2b0ddcf1814d2a6e24659775b5215f.sol#600-622)

	- dividends = calcDividends(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/24/0x8d87c5b8cd2b0ddcf1814d2a6e24659775b5215f.sol#623-626)
	- assert(bool)(m_investors.addInvestment(msg.sender,investment)) (/unique_chucks/24/0x8d87c5b8cd2b0ddcf1814d2a6e24659775b5215f.sol#628-631)
	- assert(bool)(m_investors.setPaymentTime(msg.sender,now)) (/unique_chucks/24/0x8d87c5b8cd2b0ddcf1814d2a6e24659775b5215f.sol#631-632)
	- assert(bool)(m_investors.newInvestor(msg.sender,investment,now)) (/unique_chucks/24/0x8d87c5b8cd2b0ddcf1814d2a6e24659775b5215f.sol#632-635)
	External calls sending eth:

	- advertisingAddress.send(m_advertisingPercent.mul(receivedEther)) (/unique_chucks/24/0x8d87c5b8cd2b0ddcf1814d2a6e24659775b5215f.sol#594-596)
